text:
Curious Thoughts

<setup: Raskolnikov on a street, deep in thought>
<optional narration, none>
Raskolnikov: Thirty copecks... what did I spend it on?  

Raskolnikov: Twenty to the policeman...  

Raskolnikov: Why did I take this money out?  

---  

<setup: Raskolnikov in a tavern, feeling heavy>
<optional narration, none>
Raskolnikov: A glass of vodka...  

Raskolnikov: This feels different...  

Raskolnikov: I need to rest... so tired.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov experiences a vivid and heavy dream after drinking vodka, reflecting his troubled mental state.
